page.title: 16The School Uniform
page.content: The girl's winter uniform consists of: A bottle green skirt A white blouse A green cardigan A green tie The summer uniform for the girls consists of: A green and white checked dress A green cardigan The boy's winter uniform consists of: Black or white trousers A white or grey shirt A grey or green jumper A green tie And the summer uniform consists of: Black or grey shorts A white or grey shirt A grey or green jumper A green tie The school uniform is not compulsory but most people wear it.
